artist: Manufacturer: Royal Doulton Potteries; Decorator: F. Hancock
description: brown toned ground; decoration of three yellow and white toned flowers; four flower buds at center; gilt highlights; gilded scalloped edge
life_date: Burslem, Staffordshire, and Stoke-on-Trent, English, est. 1815
markings: on bottom: \'Daulton Burslem\', in brown; \'Davis Collamore/New York\', in green; front: \'F. Hancock\', in purple, near edge
title: Dinner plate
